name: Vegan Pumpkin Brownies - Pumpkin Pie + Brownies
description: Creamy Pumpkin Layered with Fudgy Dark Chocolate Brownie. Pumpkin Pie + Brownie. Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast Vegan Pumpkin Brownies. Makes 8 by 8 inch brownie pan

video.name: Pumpkin Pie Brownies = Pumpkin Pie + Brownie - VeganRicha.com

Full Recipe at üçäüç™‚û° http://www.veganricha.com/2014/11/vegan-pumpkin-brownies.html

Pumpkin Pie + Brownie!. Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast. Makes 8 by 8 inch brownie pan. Make these while waiting for the Summer!

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup non dairy milk like almond or coconut
1 cup sugar (Use 2 Tbsp less for less sweet or if using semi-sweet chocolate instead of dark)
2/3 cup vegan dark chocolate or 1 Theo 70% Dark chocolate bar
1 cup + 2 Tbsp flour (I use Spelt or unbleached white flour)
1/4 cup vegan chocolate chips to add to batter
1  cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)
1/4 cup ground cashew or thick cashew cream

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 365 Degrees F / 180¬∫c.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 365 Degrees F / 180¬∫c.

itemListElement.text: Heat the almond milk to just about a boil. Add sugar and mix in well. Add dark chocolate, let sit for a minute then whisk well to melt. Add oil, flax, salt, cocoa and vanilla extract and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Heat the almond milk to just about a boil. Add sugar and mix in well. Add dark chocolate, let sit for a minute then whisk well to melt. Add oil, flax, salt, cocoa and vanilla extract and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Whisk the flour with starch, baking powder and baking soda and add to the wet ingredients. Mix to combine. Fold in the chocolate chips. Drop the batter onto parchment lined or greased baking pan and even it out.
itemListElement.name: Whisk the flour with starch, baking powder and baking soda and add to the wet ingredients. Mix to combine. Fold in the chocolate chips. Drop the batter onto parchment lined or greased baking pan and even it out.

itemListElement.text: Mix the ingredients under pumpkin layer until well combined.
itemListElement.name: Mix the ingredients under pumpkin layer until well combined.

itemListElement.text: Drop pumpkin mixture over brownie batter and smooth out. Swirl if you like. (The brownie batter thickens and sets as it sits, so it might be difficult to swirl. Make the pumpkin layer mix first so the brownie layer does not have time to sit) Add chocolate chips on top.
itemListElement.name: Drop pumpkin mixture over brownie batter and smooth out. Swirl if you like. (The brownie batter thickens and sets as it sits, so it might be difficult to swirl. Make the pumpkin layer mix first so the brownie layer does not have time to sit) Add chocolate chips on top.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 32 to 34 minutes at 365 degrees F / 180¬∫c or until a toothpick an inch from the side of the pan comes out almost clean. Do not over bake.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 32 to 34 minutes at 365 degrees F / 180¬∫c or until a toothpick an inch from the side of the pan comes out almost clean. Do not over bake.

itemListElement.text: Store on the counter top for the day, or refrigerated in a container for upto 5 days. Warm and serve.
itemListElement.name: Store on the counter top for the day, or refrigerated in a container for upto 5 days. Warm and serve.

keywords: pumpkin brownies, pumpkin pie brownies, pumpkin swirl brownies
